title: Getting Started with Tulz.net: Free Online Tools for Productivity
description: Discover how to maximize your productivity with Tulz.net's collection of 50+ free online tools. Learn tips, tricks, and best practices.
content:
# Getting Started with Tulz.net

Welcome to Tulz.net, your one-stop destination for powerful, free online tools!

## Why Use Online Tools?

Online tools offer several advantages:

- **Instant Access** - No installation required
- **Always Updated** - Latest features automatically
- **Cross-Platform** - Works on any device
- **Privacy-First** - Processing in your browser

## Popular Tools

### Developer Tools
- JSON Formatter - Format and validate JSON
- Base64 Encoder - Encode/decode Base64 dat
author: Tulz Team

title: AI Text Humanizer
description: Convert AI-generated text to sound more natural and human-like
content: Convert AI-generated text to sound more natural and human-like

title: AI Content Detector
description: Detect whether text was generated by AI or written by humans
content: Detect whether text was generated by AI or written by humans

description: Rewrite text while maintaining original meaning and context
content: Rewrite text while maintaining original meaning and context

content: Check and correct grammar, spelling, and punctuation errors

description: Create professional resumes with AI-powered suggestions
content: Create professional resumes with AI-powered suggestions

content: Extract text from images using free offline OCR powered by Tesseract.js

content: Free voice typing with instant browser transcription using Web Speech API
